Black women owned cruelty-free beauty brands (B.O.M.B.)

The cruelty-free status of these brands is based on the Logical Harmony database and my own research. Most products recommended to try are vegan (or otherwise explicitly noted) and made without known irritants, but please look over the ingredients before purchasing!
